books.author: by Amanda Gorman
books.description: The poem read on President Joe Biden's Inauguration Day, by the youngest poet to write and perform an inaugural poem.
books.name: THE HILL WE CLIMB

books.author: by Kristin Hannah
books.description: As dust storms roll during the Great Depression, Elsa must choose between saving the family and farm or heading West.
books.name: THE FOUR WINDS

books.author: by Delia Owens
books.description: In a quiet town on the North Carolina coast in 1969, a young woman who survived alone in the marsh becomes a murder suspect.
books.name: WHERE THE CRAWDADS SING

books.author: by Matt Haig
books.description: Nora Seed finds a library beyond the edge of the universe that contains books with multiple possibilities of the lives one could have lived.
books.name: THE MIDNIGHT LIBRARY

books.author: by Cynthia D'Aprix Sweeney
books.description: The foundation of a marriage between actors is shaken when they reunite with an old friend who is now a TV star.
books.name: GOOD COMPANY

books.author: by James Patterson and David Ellis
books.description: The second book in the Black Book thriller series. Chicago detective Billy Harney investigates his own past.
books.name: THE RED BOOK

books.author: by Harlan Coben
books.description: Windsor Horne Lockwood III might rectify cold cases connected to his family that have eluded the F.B.I. for decades.
books.name: WIN

books.author: by Flynn Berry
books.description: The sister of a BBC producer may have joined the Irish Republican Army.
books.name: NORTHERN SPY

books.author: by Madeline Miller
books.description: A reimagining of Homer’s “Iliad” that is narrated by Achilles' companion Patroclus.
books.name: THE SONG OF ACHILLES

books.author: by Stephen King
books.description: An N.Y.P.D. detective asks the son of a struggling single mother to use his unnatural ability to track a killer.
books.name: LATER

books.author: by Haruki Murakami
books.description: A collection of eight short stories on love, childhood and memory.
books.name: FIRST PERSON SINGULAR

books.author: by Julia Quinn
books.description: The first book in the Bridgerton series. Daphne Bridgerton’s reputation soars when she colludes with the Duke of Hastings. The basis of the Netflix series “Bridgerton.”
books.name: THE DUKE AND I

books.author: by Kate Quinn
books.description: As a post-World War II royal wedding approaches, an encrypted letter resurrects an alliance between three female code breakers.
books.name: THE ROSE CODE

books.author: by Abby Jimenez
books.description: The third book in the Friend Zone series. Vanessa Price deals with unexpected changes.
books.name: LIFE'S TOO SHORT

books.author: by Caroline Kepnes
books.description: The third book in the You series. Joe becomes interested in a librarian who appears to be too busy for him.
books.name: YOU LOVE ME
